items.sentence: I wonder whether Tom still lives in Australia.
I'd have done that by myself if I'd known how.
No one thought that Tom would die before Mary.
What's your dream for yourself in three years?
Flight attendants, please prepare for takeoff.
You need to get up here as quickly as you can.
The truth be told, Tom didn't need to do that.
When was the last time you hugged your mother?
Tom was aware that Mary had already gone home.
Tom was allowed to visit his father in prison.
